DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the safety of MDV3100 given in combination with Docetaxel in men with advanced prostate cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability Study of MDV3100 in Combination With Docetaxel in Men With Advanced Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Willing and able to provide informed consent; Men, 18 years of age or older; Histologically or cytologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate; Ongoing androgen deprivation therapy Severe concurrent disease; Known or suspected brain metastasis; History of another malignancy within the previous 5 years; Prior treatment with docetaxelbased chemotherapy
